feed.title: Ice Cubes Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.50
entry.content:
• Support new Notifications filter API.
  • Various bug fixes.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.51
entry.content:
• Fully compatible with iOS 18, macOS 15 and visionOS 2
  • Refined sidebar on macOS.
  • Various other fixes related to new OS updates.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.54
entry.content:
• To speed up the app, the automatic streaming of new posts has been disabled on the home timeline. You can use push to refresh instead.
  • Fix a crash on macOS 14.
  • Various fixes.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.55
entry.content:
• To speed up the app, the automatic streaming of new posts has been disabled on the home timeline. You can use push to refresh instead.
  • Tap the timeline tab to scroll to top is back!
  • An old icon is back!
  • Various fixes.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.56
entry.content:
• Various fixes related to the video player.
  • Fix the notifications filter.
  • Optimise timeline scrolling.
